description: Combined Node, IB & GPU Metrics Dashboard (w/o GPU Profiling)

panels.description: RX/TX rate of VM's Ethernet Interface
panels.title: Ethernet Throughput (RX/TX)

panels.description: Indication of IB Link status. Up:1 and Down:0
panels.title: IB Link Status

panels.description: The rate of data received/transmitted on the IB port
panels.title: IB Throughput (RX/TX)

panels.description: Total number of packets containing an error that were received on the port.
panels.title: Port Rcv Errors

panels.description: Total number of packets received on the switch physical port that are discarded.
panels.title: Port Rcv Constraint Errors

panels.description: Number of ticks during which the port had data to transmit but no data was sent during the entire tick
panels.title: Port Xmit Wait

panels.description: Total number of packets not transmitted from the switch physical port.
panels.title: Port Xmit Constraint Errors

panels.description: Total number of outbound packets discarded by the port because the port is down or congested.
panels.title: Port Xmit Discards

panels.description: Total energy consumption since boot (in mJ)
panels.title: Total Energy Consumption

panels.description: Total number of single-bit persistent ECC errors
panels.title: SBE Persistent ECC Errors

panels.description: Total number of double-bit persistent ECC errors
panels.title: DBE Persistent ECC Errors

panels.description: Total number of single-bit volatile ECC errors
panels.title: SBE Volatile ECC Errors

panels.description: Total number of double-bit volatile ECC errors
panels.title: DBE Volatile ECC Errors

panels.description: The rate of data received/transmitted over the PCIe bus, including both protocol headers and data payloads, in bytes per second
panels.title: PCIe Throughput (RX/TX)

panels.description: The rate of data received over NVLink, not including protocol headers, in bytes per second
panels.title: NVLink Throughput (RX/TX)

title: Combined Node, IB & GPU Metrics Dashboard (w/o GPU Profiling)
